name: Checkers³
description:
Similar to a traditional game of checkers, but played in a 3 dimensional space.

• Play against the computer (2 variations, EZ and standard).
• Play head-to-head with a friend on your device.
• Play nearby opponents via bluetooth/network connection.
• Play online opponents via game center.
• In-game chat with nearby or online opponents!
• Compare and share your scores with others.
